name: sandbox
description: Sandbox Monorepo with Next.js, FastAPI and SDK

scripts.build: npm run build:sdk && npm run build:frontend
scripts.redis: cd apps/backend && docker compose up redis
scripts.database: cd apps/backend && docker compose up postgres
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "FRONTEND,BACKEND,REDIS,DATABASE" -c "blue,green,yellow,purple" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run backend" "npm run redis" "npm run database"
